src.utils.qgis_helper

QGIS helper functions module.

Attributes

message

Functions

get_bounding_box_transformed(bbox, source_crs, target_crs)

Get bounding box from canvas and transform it if necessary to the default target CRS.

get_bounding_box_canvas()

Get bounding box from canvas.

get_selected_feature_bounding_box(layer_id[, ...])

Get bounding box from feature. By default, the first feature in the array is used if no feature is selected.

get_valid_project_layers_to_search()

Get vector layers names from current project excluding the ones in the results group.

save_setting(setting_name, value)

Save setting.

read_setting(setting_name[, default_value])

Read setting.

save_json_setting(setting_name, value)

Save json setting.

read_json_setting(setting_name[, default_value])

Read json setting.

error_message(title, text)

Show error message.

warning_message(title, text)

Show warning message.

info_message(title, text)

Show info message.

success_message(title, text)

Show success message.

get_or_create_group(group_name)

Get or create group.

get_layer_by_name(layer_name)

Get layer by name.

get_or_create_footprints_layer(layer_name, group_name)

Get or create footprints layer.

add_feature_to_layer(coordinates, feature_id, layer)

Add feature to layer.

get_georeferenced_image(feature, image_path)

Get georeferenced image from feature and image path.

create_quicklook_layer(footprints_crs, layer_name, ...)

Create a layer with a quicklook image.

zoom_selected_features(layer)

Zoom to selected features in layer.
